summary: E2E Sales Flow Testing Complete - All backend tests pass (100%), frontend navigation and UI verified. Complete sales workflow tested: Lead → Meeting/MOM → Pricing Plan → SOW → Quotation → Agreement → Kickoff Request
critical_code_review_comments: All 25 backend API tests pass (100%) covering the complete sales workflow
Lead CRUD operations work correctly with score calculation
Meeting creation with MOM (Minutes of Meeting) works as expected
Pricing Plan creation requires project_duration_type field (validated)
SOW creation returns sow_id in response (not id), test adjusted
Agreement approval and Kickoff Request creation work correctly
API responses use different field names (kickoff_request vs kickoff) - documented in tests
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_E2E leads, meetings, pricing plans, SOW, quotations, agreements, and kickoff requests during backend testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Complete E2E sales flow tested. Backend APIs all working. Frontend pages verified: Login, Dashboard, Leads, Pricing Plans, Agreements, Kickoff Requests, Sales Portal. The /meetings route is not defined - use /sales-meetings or /consulting-meetings instead. Sales Portal has separate login at /sales/login.

Backend API Tests.Lead Management: PASSED - Create, Read, Update, List leads with score calculation
Backend API Tests.Meeting & MOM: PASSED - Create meeting, add MOM, get meeting details
Backend API Tests.SOW: PASSED - Create SOW, add line items
Backend API Tests.Kickoff Request: PASSED - Create kickoff, get list, get details

Frontend UI Tests.Dashboard: PASSED - Shows Business Overview with stats
Frontend UI Tests.Leads Page: PASSED - Shows leads with scores, Add Lead dialog works
Frontend UI Tests.Pricing Plans Page: PASSED - Top-down pricing form with team deployment
Frontend UI Tests.Agreements Page: PASSED - Lists agreements with View/PDF/Word options
Frontend UI Tests.Kickoff Requests Page: PASSED - Shows pending/returned requests with New button
Frontend UI Tests.Sales Portal Dashboard: PASSED - Shows sales pipeline and performance metrics
